comments.body:
So this actually relies on the `children` method, which was not working for `binaryCompat` fields previously and now that it started working it turns out that origin is not set for a number of cases. They should be fixed now.

I also added dialect and `.map(_.structure)` otherwise an exception was thrown while trying to print the trees.
This also explains why I was having problems getting a proper formatting for `inline if` :sweat_smile:
